item.title: Connect to your ssh boxes faster
item.description: If you want ultra-fast connection login times to your ssh servers you may like to change several values in the /etc/ssh/sshd_config file along with RSA authentication: GSSAPIAuthentication no UseDNS no You can use this only if you don't need GSS or reverse DNS of course. No more delays. Every milisecond counts!
